# Compute the linear model
def compute_linear_model(years, runs, title):
    
    X = np.column_stack([np.ones(len(years)), years])
    
    a = la.solve(X.T @ X, X.T @ runs)

    model = a[0] + a[1] * years

    plt.plot(years, model, years, runs, 'b.', ms = 15)
    plt.title(title)
    plt.ylim([0, np.amax(runs) + 500])
    plt.grid(True)
    plt.show()
